## Final Project
```{r}
library(dplyr)
```

```{r}
overall_income <- read.csv("C:/wages_sep/wages_sep.csv") %>%
  select(year, demographic, wages)
```

```{r}
aggregated_overall_income <- aggregate(wages ~ year + demographic, data = overall_income, FUN = mean)
```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
aggregated_overall_income %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(
    mapping = aes(
      x = year,
      y = wages,
      color = demographic
    )
  )
```
